data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 88,788 believers in Ulaan Chab to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,081,612 lost friends and neighbors.

data.section_summary: On average, 87 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, use Google search to lead people in Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China to the gospel today.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Mongolian, Peripheral people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ulaan Chab.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Ulaan Chab you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China has a population of 1,170,400.

We estimate Ulaan Chab has 88,788 people who might know Jesus, 18,908 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,062,704 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ulaan Chab, Nei Mongol, China a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
